Holidays of DPRK to Be Marked in Egypt
articles.content:
Holidays of DPRK to Be Marked in Egypt 
    Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the Egyptian preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea was held in Cairo on July 20.
 At the ceremony, Vice-Minister of Agriculture Muhammad al Husseini al Akad was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee set the period of celebrations from July 20 to October 15 and decided to hold multifarious functions such as a rally, a seminar, a photo exhibition and a film show.

articles.title: Indian National Preparatory Committee Formed
articles.content:
Indian National Preparatory Committee Formed 
    Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The Indian national preparatory committee to celebrate the 60th anniversaries of the Workers' Party of Korea and Korea's liberation was inaugurated with due ceremony in New Delhi on July 20.
 P. Shiv Shankar, former Indian foreign minister and chairman of the All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee set the celebration period from July 20 to October 10 and decided to organize various functions, including national seminar, rally, lecture meeting, round-table talks, film show and photo exhibition, on a large scale in the period to widely introduce the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

Release of All Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Release of All Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The Family Movement for Realizing Democracy of south Korea reportedly held the 577th Thursday meeting in Seoul on July 21 in demand of the release of all the prisoners of conscience.
 Present at the meeting were Im Ki Ran, advisor to the movement, Kim Hye Gyong, representative of the Democratic Workers' Party, and members of the organizations of various circles, families of prisoners of conscience and political offenders on the want list.    
 At the meeting the speakers deplored that the patriotic figures who fought for democratization and reunification are still subject to all forms of violation behind bars.
 They strongly demanded the "government" release all the prisoners of conscience on the occasion of August 15.

Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il from Military Attaches' Corps
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il from Military Attaches' Corps
    Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a congratulatory letter by the military attaches' corps here on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
 On behalf of the military attaches' corps, Nguyen Van Chau, military attache of the Vietnamese embassy here, Tuesday handed the congratulatory letter to an official concerned.

Greetings to Maldivian Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Maldivian Foreign Minister
    Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to his Maldivian counterpart Ahmed Shaheed on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of its independence.
 Expressing the belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop favorably, the message wished him greater success in his work.

articles.title: Greetings to Maldivian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Maldivian President
    Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greetings to Maldivian President Maumoon Abdul Gayoom on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the independence of the Republic of Maldives.
 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would gain in scope in the mutual interests, the message sincerely wished the Maldivian president good health and happiness and the Maldivian people progress and prosperity.
